Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a minor fire at track level.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
